channel.title: Small suggestions I think should be added [Game & Balance] - a bit UI
channel.description:
Hey there Nazle here
**Here are some few suggestions I think should be added which would make the game easier to play**
**NB:** When responding to a suggestion, just include what number suggestion you are responding to.
**1.** Being able to whisper to a player while someone is accused.
**2.** Make sure the Journal you are writing doesn't close when someones else journal popps up after they've died.
**3.** You should be able to check someones last journal after they've been revived from the dead. Prince die, read journal... he gets revived... then you can't read it anymore. There is crucial information in the prince journals, so thats why - example, this could be any role btw.
**4.** There should be a button right next to the Learn to play which would take you to a page in side the game with all the rules so players don't have to search for the rules, all in all it just makes the game more easier to understand and keeps you updated on the rules if you want to check them.
This doesn't need to be right next to the l2p button, but it should be easily accessible. :smile:
